name: crazyxhtml
tag_list: psd-to-html, psd2html, psd-to-css, convert-psd-to-css, convert-psd-to-html, psd-to-wordpress, psd-to-xhtml, psd-to-html5
description: Convert PSD to HTML, HTML5, XHTML , CSS
overview:
We are professional programmers and offer services for coding designs to XHTML / CSS. We are situated out of the Czech Republic in Prague.

We have experts who constantly explore the new HTML / CSS technologies. We apply the various trends to make your website faster, intriguing and impactful. We do not apply any software to get automatic proof because we implement hand-coding (Coda, Dreamweaver or Notepad). We apply minimum XHTML tags as well as CSS styles to make your website download faster. We make efforts in a way that your design is matched 100% precisely.

We make efforts to give well commented XHTML and CSS files. We are compatible to all the versions of Firefox, IE, Google Chrome, Opera, Safari, SeaMonkey and Camino.

We offer mobile device compatibility to Blackberry 5+, Android 2.2+, iPhone and iPad. We follow semantic markup applied for SEO. We offer W3C valid hand-coded services.
